item.title: Sail Forth now available for Switch 2 alongside ‘Battle for Croaker Command’ update
item.content:encoded:
Sail Forth is now available for Switch 2 alongside the “Battle for Croaker Command” update, publisher The Quantum Astrophysicists Guild and developer Festive Vector announced. It is a free upgrade from the Switch version.

Sail Forth first launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG on December 21, 2022.

Here is an overview of the free update, via The Quantum Astrophysicists Guild:

“Battle for Croaker Command,” available on all platforms. Work alongside the Croaker Command Corps to build a base, including guard towers, cantina, fish pond, bait shop, and core extractor. But beware, the Tekk Clan has a new boss waiting: the Tekk Destroyer. Defending your base will be no easy feat, but doing so will reward you with a new, powerful ship: The Croaker Flagship
